name: Guru â€” all Figma missing features
description:
Use more accurate Scale Tool, find and select layers by name, save and restore selections, mark and count layers, etc. Make your workflow smoother and deliver design with a Sonic speed. No more switching between tons of plugins.


Guru is adapted for fast work:

  • Supports keyboard control.
  • Feature list reordering via drag and drop.
  • Quick search (made for the future, because the list of features is growing).


We regularly develop new features and adjust current ones. Want something new? Just text us via feedback form.
